## types package

<img src="https://placecorgi.herokuapp.com/300/250" align="right" />

<h3>Why does this library exist?</h3>

`@change/types` is a package containing broadly-useful types and type guards

## Remarks

All interfaces are prefixed with `I`

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isTeam(arg)](./types.isteam.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Check whether a given value is an [ITeam](./types.iteam.md) |
|  [isTypedArray(arr, check)](./types.istypedarray.md) | Check whether a given value is an array where each member is of a specified type |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ITeam](./types.iteam.md) | A generic team for our change app |
|  [IUser](./types.iuser.md) | A generic user for our change app |
